description: The Men's Echo Featherless Hoody is good for the Earth and even better for cold days. Made from recycled nylon fishnets and 3M™ Thinsulate™ Featherless insulation, so you can enjoy the feel and performance of natural down without the allergens. Don't worry about spills or perspiration while on the trail since this jacket keeps insulating even when wet. When a deluge hits, pull on the hood, tuck your hands in the zippered pockets, and tighten the adjustable drawcord hem.
name: Marmot Echo Featherless Hoody - Mens
